resources.string: Oops... It seems like you have missed a field or forgot to choose your transportation reason. Please make sure you have everything correct.

This is an app created for people who are experiencing difficulties with technology and for elderly people whom we are trying to protect.

Note that your data will be saved locally to your phone and will be deleted when you uninstall the application. In addition to that, data you provide will not be distributed to any Third Party applications or services.
The app is not making any internet connections and the only permission it requires is sms sending.
This app is NOT using GPS or any other tracking software, therefore it doesn't know where you are and what you are doing.


You can view the open source code with the updates on GitHub and there is also a video on youtube of me developing the app "How to make your own 13033 app (C# Xamarin Visual Studio)".

Created by Konstantinos Pap.

No Copyrights -- Open Source Project

 #stayhome #staysafe
Please make sure that you have received an answer from 13033 to go out. Note that this message will be valid after the response from 13033

You are about to exceed the maximum amount of messages sent to 13033 within 24 hours. Are you sure you want to proceed? In case you don\'t receive a response from 13033 when you have exceeded the maximum amount of messages sent then the service has rejected your request and note that the application has nothing to do with it.
Oops, something went wrong and your sms wasn\'t sent
Do you wish to be alerted before the timer expires?
Define how much time before SMS expiration you want to be alarmed
